duties_responsibilities.duty: Support multiple manufacturing locations with month-end close, reporting, and manufacturing cost analysis.
Assist with monthly forecasts for assigned cost centers and present forecasts to management.
Provide financial support including budgeting, forecasting, working capital, productivity metrics, and restructuring.
Coordinate with management to gather and analyze financial results and prepare financial recommendations.
Prepare financial reporting package, operating review presentations, and financial analysis for capital investments and profitability.
Analyze monthly cost reports and compare to budget analysis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance (CPA / CMA preferred)
